description:
Don't pay stores or others to remove infections from your computer, many of the issues you will face on the computer are easy to fix with the proper know-how. I'll explain to you how to do an express clean up and tune up after we back up the computer. Feel confident that you'll be able to do this. I'm here to help, and will offer my students who finish the course and rate it a special coupon for others courses and services I offer.  This course is intended for beginners, as I explain everything to you and use easy to understand words and you're following along while seeing the videos as we go through this on my computer screen.

The cyber scammers have a huge advantage on our people because they do not know this information, and computer repair shops won't teach this to you, they'd rather charge you. I'm here to empower you like I've been empowered. You can learn this and stay tuned as I add additional videos and continue to teach you new tips and tricks.

Many people get fooled and scammed very easily from adware infections on their computers. Having many years of experience working with this, I'm able to show you how to avoid the infections and how to clean it as well as to be able to make money doing this as a service to your family and friends. You'll be doing them and yourself a huge favor. I'm here to support you as your instructor. What are you waiting for? Enroll now and let's change the digital world! 

If you ever feel stuck as my student, have confident that I'll be able to personally work with you to resolve your unique computer problem and leave you feeling amazing that you learned something new.
title: Destroy adware & PC viruses and learn how to avoid them
